HomePage.description: This is the inventory page of the Swag Labs demo application, displaying a list of available products.

elements.name: Product Sort Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown to sort the products by different criteria (e.g., name, price).

elements.name: Add to cart button for Sauce Labs Backpack
elements.description: Button to add the Sauce Labs Backpack to the shopping cart.

elements.name: Add to cart button for Sauce Labs Bike Light
elements.description: Button to add the Sauce Labs Bike Light to the shopping cart.

elements.name: Add to cart button for Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt
elements.description: Button to add the Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt to the shopping cart.

elements.name: Add to cart button for Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket
elements.description: Button to add the Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket to the shopping cart.

elements.name: Add to cart button for Sauce Labs Onesie
elements.description: Button to add the Sauce Labs Onesie to the shopping cart.

elements.name: Add to cart button for Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)
elements.description: Button to add the Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red) to the shopping cart.

elements.name: Shopping Cart Icon
elements.description: Link to navigate to the shopping cart page.

assertions: At least one product item is displayed

SwagLabsPage.description: This is the login page for Swag Labs, where users can enter their credentials to access the inventory.

elements.name: Username Input
elements.description: Input field for the username.

elements.name: Password Input
elements.description: Input field for the password.

elements.name: Login Button
elements.description: Button to submit the login form.

elements.name: Accepted usernames
elements.description: Text indicating the accepted usernames.

elements.name: Password for all users
elements.description: Text indicating the password for all users.

assertions: Password for all users text is present

SaucedemoInventoryPage.description: The inventory page displays a list of available products with their names, descriptions, prices, and 'Add to cart' buttons.

elements.name: Product Name
elements.description: The name of the product.

elements.name: Product Description
elements.description: The description of the product.

elements.name: Product Price
elements.description: The price of the product.

elements.name: Add to Cart Button
elements.description: Button to add the product to the shopping cart.

elements.name: Product Image
elements.description: Image of the product.

elements.name: Products Header
elements.description: The 'Products' header text.

elements.name: Filter Products
elements.description: Dropdown to filter products by name or price.

assertions: At least one product is displayed with a name, description, price, and 'Add to cart' button

UnknownPage.description: This is the login page for the Swag Labs application, where users can enter their credentials to access the application's features.

elements.name: Username Input
elements.description: Input field for the username.

elements.name: Password Input
elements.description: Input field for the password.

elements.name: Login Button
elements.description: Button to submit the login form.

elements.name: Accepted usernames
elements.description: Text displaying accepted usernames

elements.name: Password for all users
elements.description: Text displaying password for all users

assertions: Login button is present and enabled
Username and password input fields are present
The text 'Accepted usernames are:' is displayed
The text 'Password for all users:' is displayed
